scripts.isOnline: async function n(){console.log("Checking if the plugin source is online")}var e=n;export{e as default};
scripts.getDetailedManga: async function a(e){console.log(`Retrieving detailed information for manga with ID: ${e}`)}var n=a;export{n as default};
scripts.getList: async function a(e,t,n){console.log(`Retrieving manga list for page ${e}, genre: ${t}, status: ${n}`)}var g=a;export{g as default};
scripts.getImage: async function o(e){console.log(`Retrieving image from URL: ${e}`)}var g=o;export{g as default};
scripts.getSuggestion: async function o(e){console.log(`Retrieving suggestions for query: ${e}`)}var g=o;export{g as default};
scripts.getChapter: async function a(e,t){console.log(`Retrieving chapter ${t.id} for manga ${e.title}`)}var n=a;export{n as default};
scripts.getMangas: async function o(n){console.log(`Retrieving mangas for IDs: ${n.join(", ")}`)}var a=o;export{a as default};
scripts.search: async function n(a,e){console.log(`Searching for manga with query: ${a} on page: ${e}`)}var o=n;export{o as default};
